cover.prompt: Epic portrait composition of Benjamin Franklin through three life stages merged artistically: young runaway teen on left, adult scientist with kite in center, elderly founding father on right. Patriotic but not cartoonish. NO text, NO logos.

The boy has bright curious eyes and messy brown hair. Gentle caricature style, historically accurate 1720s setting. NO text, NO watermarks.
